text: 71 List the three most succesful fantasy movies based on novels. Desired output format: A JSON with the keys novel_title, novel_year_of_publication, movie_title, movie_year_of_release. Certainly! Here are three highly successful fantasy movies that are based on novels: json ) Copycode L { ), { ), { 3} 1 Note: The first movie's novel is titled "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone" in the UK and some other regions, while it is known as "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" in the USA. The novel "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring" is the first part of the "Lord of the Rings" trilogy by J.R.R. Tolkien.
